item.title: Hunter Biden says his mistakes were 'exploited' for political sport, he will never take pardon for granted
item.description: Hunter Biden said after his father, President Joe Biden, pardoned him that his mistakes have been "exploited to publicly humiliate and shame me and my...

item.title: Lawmakers harshly criticize Biden’s decision to pardon Hunter: ‘Liar’
item.description: President Biden pardoned his son Hunter on Sunday, and now federal lawmakers are responding, calling the president a liar after he claimed he would no...

item.title: Trump asks about 'J-6 Hostages' in response to Biden's pardon of Hunter: 'Such an abuse'
item.description: President-elect Trump asked about "J-6 Hostages" in his reaction to President Biden pardoning his son Hunter Biden.

item.title: Biden pardons son Hunter Biden ahead of exit from Oval Office
item.description: President Biden pardoned his son Hunter Biden after he was convicted in a felony gun case and a separate felony tax case earlier this year.

item.title: Bernie Sanders admits ‘Elon Musk is right’ to slash Pentagon with DOGE: ‘Lost track of billions’
item.description: Sen. Bernie Sanders turned to X on Sunday to say "Elon Musk is right" before going on about the Pentagon's wasteful spending and failed audits.
